general.name: NetLogix - File Creation Monitor [WIN]
general.description: Monitors a user-defined file path and alerts if the file exists, or if the file is absent.

variable.name: FileToBeFound
variable.description: Absolute path to folder/file to be monitored. Do not use quote marks.

variable.name: usrCheckReboot
variable.description: Check if the file was created before or after the latest OS startup
